key_risks: Legal and financial risks from contract disputes and wage litigation

Technological disruption from autonomous vehicles and ride-sharing services
controversies: Legal dispute with Metropolis Holdings, LLC over breach of contract and fraud

Discrimination lawsuit alleging violations of the ADA and Title VII of the Civil Rights Act

social_issues: Labor challenges including wage disputes and shortages
governance_issues: Compliance risks related to wage and labor practices
Reputation risks from ongoing legal and ethical controversies
